idea:
ABLAGE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED 

 Includes Sales & Distribution, Calibration (as per International Standards viz. ASTM, ISO & EN), Repair & Servicing , Annual Maintenance and Installation of various NDT quality testing systems. Various NDT type of technique like :Ultrasonic Testing, Portable Hardness Testing, Wire Rope Testing, ECT & EMAT systems, MPI testing, Portable X-Ray Systems and RT accessories.

Providing solutions for the various foreign principals like Proceq Asia, Singapore, Vidisco Ltd, Israel, Intron Plus, Russia & Sonatest,UK equipment. We have well trained and authorized person for the repair and calibration purposes.

Also we have Sales & Distribution of Test & Measuring instruments. – Extech, Motwane, Scientech, Metrel Products.Installation, Repair, Calibration service of Test & Measuring Instruments and other Industrial Equipment.

Providing On-Site Maintenance, calibration & Inspection Services.
Whole sales & Distribution of Electrical accessories, measuring instruments for various industries, educational institutes, construction team, various manufacturing plants and research institutes.
name: ABLAGE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: INDOSYKI RESOURCES (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED is an enterprise set up to build and manage soft and social infrastructure structure, like housing, K-12 schools, highway rest, areas, etc. using a unique, web and mobile based application, based on the principles of aggregating demand, group buying, predetermined location preference, price discovery, built to suit, just in time, facilities, unifying and digitizing the market at a fractional cost to all participants, including but not limited to the approving authorities, and the quasi/governmental certifying agencies.
name: INDOSYKI RESOURCES (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
The world is changing faster than ever before, we have updated the way we live, so isn’t it time we update the way we work.

The technology landscape has become sophisticated, business threats and competitions are ever-evolving and disruption is never to build.

These changes, in turn, are creating huge demands for better, agile, and resilient technology solutions using the second machine age era of technologies such as Robotic Process Automation, Business Process Management, Artificial Intelligence, Optical Character Recognition, and the Internet of Things.

Second Machine Age, a Solely focused company on business process automation space and offers world-class end-to-end hyper-intelligent automation solutions and services to give the business a significant boost and help forge ahead in a highly competitive world.

Our experts use the second machine age era of technologies to create agile, resilient, feature-rich, and interactive hyper-intelligent automation solutions, helping businesses boost efficiencies and increase productivity along with enhancing an image.

Second Machine Age Establish in 2018 and becoming a rapidly growing company in the business process automation space. The Company has been promoted by some highly experienced professionals dedicated to providing end-to-end automation solutions under one roof. It possesses not only the latest technology gadgets but also the most knowledgeable and experienced hands to offer the most user-friendly customized automation solutions.

Feat Systems creativity, flexibility, prompt response, and State of the Art helps to stand out easily from the rest of computer software and IT services companies.

We are on a mission to transform and simplify human being's life at work by creating agile and resilient hyper-intelligent automation solutions.
name: SECOND MACHINE AGE CONSULTANCY SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED
